entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 9 - X509CertificateLoader.LoadPkcs12 - private key throws error on certificate load #109881
  • [DAC] ISOSDacInterface:GetMethodDescData reads from nullptr #109877
  • [browser] Change default boot.json name #109876
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span on SpanSplitEnumerator #109874
  • Possible System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource trimming issue #109872
    8.0.x
  • [wasm] chrome-DebuggerTests crashing with DeadLetter #109870
  • Contains extension method on arrays is resolved from MemoryExtensions instead of Linq breaking EF queries #109869
  • Custom JsonConverter breaks context variable in JsonSchemaExporterOptions.TransformSchemaNode callback #109868
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109867
  • Internal CLR error 0x80131506 when running the test for System.Private.CoreLib #109865
  • WASM AOT fails with regex in .NET 9 #109862
    9.0.x
  • System.Management 9.0.0 throws an exception #109860
  • [API Proposal]: More `MemoryExtension` methods accepting `SearchValues<T>` #109859
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Version 9.0: UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups() throws System.UriFormatException: Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed. #109858
  • JsonSerializerContext generated source breaks for property named "@event" #109854
    Future

Closed

  • [Proposal] Vectorized System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<K, V> #108098
    Future
  • Introduce a 'lazy' TextReader #34529
  • window.Module.FS and IDBFS no longer works in .NET 9 #109810
    9.0.0
  • [Help] [RISC-V] GC crash on System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceTest.AllSubscriberStress #105808
    Future
  • iOS UI Culture for Localisation #108753
  • DriveInfo constructor does not accept nonexistent path on Linux, only Windows #26081
  • Support PInvoke exports via regular LoadLibrary/etc. without setting up runtime first #3750
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix obtaining type handles of IDynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation #109875
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Simplify usage of TestPlaceholderTarget in tests #109873
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Disable some chrome-DebuggerTests that are crashing with DeadLetter #109871
    area-Debugger-mono
  • fix(wasm): proper library detection for browserwasm and wasi #109866
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add floating point config support in GC #109863
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Numerical ordering for string compare/equals/hashcode #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix failing test on NativeAOT #109853
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Use current STJ in HostModel and remove unnecessary audit suppressions #109852
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #109880
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Revert "Merging internal commits for release/6.0" #109878
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #109743
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109723
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • [wasm] Use correct current runtime pack version for Wasm.Build.Tests #109836
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Delete reflection-free mode #109857
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #109830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix native aot outerloop #109849
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [cdac] Implement `ExecutionManager.ReadyToRunJitManager.GetMethodInfo` (minus handling of hot/cold lookup) #109766
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Relax cost improvement assert in 3-opt layout #109835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Docs updates #109808
    needs-area-label
  • Add SseFormatter #109832
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [WASI] throw PNSE in `ManualResetEventSlim.Wait` #109839
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] add trailing header support to WasiHTTPHandler #109840
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] Skip signal handler registration on WASI #109838
    arch-wasm, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
